distinct
from T_J_ORDER
order by ${orderByClause}

update T_J_ORDER
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE = #{record.orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TIME = #{record.orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PERIODS = #{record.periods,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

LOAN_CONTRACT_NO = #{record.loanContractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUEBILL_NO = #{record.duebillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEND_AMOUNT = #{record.lendAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LEND_DATE = #{record.lendDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ACTUAL_SETTLE_DATE = #{record.actualSettleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PX_NO = #{record.pxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOAN_TYPE = #{record.loanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update T_J_ORDER set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_AMOUNT = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPLY_IP = #{applyIp,jdbcType=CHAR}, REPAY_TYPE = #{repayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_REPAY_DATE = #{lastRepayDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERIODS = #{periods,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INTER_RATE = #{interRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OVERDUE_RATE = #{overdueRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTRACT_VER = #{contractVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVIEWOR = #{reviewor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVIEW_TIME = #{reviewTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVIEW_REMARK = #{reviewRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOANOR = #{loanor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAN_TIME = #{loanTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAN_AMOUNT = #{loanAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{loanProgress,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOAN_CONTRACT_NO = #{loanContractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUEBILL_NO = #{duebillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEND_AMOUNT = #{lendAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LEND_DATE = #{lendDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NET_CONTRACT_URL = #{netContractUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAY_ACC_NAME = #{repayAccName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAY_ACC_NO = #{repayAccNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAN_RATE = #{loanRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OVERDUE_DAY = #{overdueDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SERVICE_CHARGE = #{serviceCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_RECEIVED = #{isReceived,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOAN_LENGTH = #{loanLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVAIL_BALANCE = #{availBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YC_MESSAGE = #{ycMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIXED_REPAY_DATE = #{fixedRepayDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTUAL_SETTLE_DATE = #{actualSettleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_ID = #{payId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_ORDER_ID = #{realOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_ORDER_AMOUNT = #{realOrderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PX_NO = #{pxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAN_TYPE = #{loanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select u.user_only_id as userOnlyId,r.id as orderId,r.loan_id as loanId from T_J_ORDER r,T_J_USER_INFO u where r.user_id = u.user_id
and r.status =#{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and r.LOAN_TIME like concat(#{loanTime},'%')
order by r.loan_time desc

select x.* from (select m.* from (select t.*, w.user_only_id from t_j_order t left join t_j_zgd_white w on t.user_id = '100' || lpad(w.user_only_id, 20, '0') where w.user_only_id is not null and w.province_name like '浙江%' and t.order_type = '9121' and w.user_only_id = #{userOnlyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by t.actual_settle_date) m where rownum = 1) x where x.actual_settle_date >= #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and x.actual_settle_date <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and not exists (select 1 from T_J_ACTIVITY_INFO a where a.user_only_id = x.user_only_id)

select t.*, w.user_only_id from t_j_order t left join t_j_zgd_white w on t.user_id = '100' || lpad(w.user_only_id, 20, '0') where w.user_only_id is not null and w.province_name like '浙江%' and t.order_type = '9121' and w.user_only_id = #{userOnlyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and exists (select 1 from t_j_order t2 where t2.actual_settle_date >= #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t2.actual_settle_date <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t2.user_id = '100' || lpad(#{userOnlyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 20, '0')) and not exists (select 1 from T_J_ACTIVITY_INFO a where a.user_only_id = #{userOnlyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select o.id from ULEAPP_FINANCECR.t_j_due d, ULEAPP_FINANCECR.t_j_Order o where d.due_id = o.id and o.order_type = '9131' and d.status <> 1 and d.status <> 2 and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by d.loan_time asc

select a.user_only_id,o.order_type,d.loan_amount,d.acc_no,d.loan_time,a.open_date from ULEAPP_FINANCECR.t_j_Due d left join ULEAPP_FINANCECR.t_j_Order o on d.due_id = o.id left join ULEAPP_FINANCECR.t_j_Account_Info a on o.user_id=a.user_id left join t_j_zgd_white w on a.user_only_id=w.user_only_id where 1 = 1 and ((o.order_type = '9121' and d.loan_amount >= 10000) or (o.order_type = '9131' and d.loan_amount >= 5000)) and a.user_only_id = #{userOnlyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.open_date >= #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.open_date <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.loan_time >= #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||' 00:00:00' and d.loan_time <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||' 23:59:59' and w.province_name like '%浙江%'
